inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientEventlogInfoV2_CL
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by MachineName, TimeCreated
| project-reorder CollectionTime desc
| project-reorder MachineName, Message asc 
| project-rename EventID=Id_
| where EventID == 6008
| distinct MachineName
| sort by MachineName asc 
|summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"UNEXPECTED SHUTDOWNS | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientBitlockerInfoV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where OSDisk_ProtectionStatus == 0
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, CollectionTime, OSDisk_DriveLetter, OSDisk_EncryptionPercentage, OSDisk_VolumeStatus, OSDisk_ProtectionStatus, OSDisk_CapacityGB,  OSDisk_KeyProtector
| sort by Computer asc  
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT BITLOCKER | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientGroupPolicyRefreshV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where GPLastRefresh > ago(-7d)
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, CollectionTime, GPLastRefreshDays, GPLastRefresh
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"LAST GROUP POLICY REFRESH MORE THAN 7 DAYS AGO | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientComputerInfoV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| extend OsUpTime = todynamic(OsUptime)
| mv-expand OsUptime
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, OsUptime_Days=toint(OsUpTime.Days), CollectionTime
| sort by OsUptime_Days desc
| where OsUptime_Days > 7
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"NO RESTART MORE THAN 7 DAYS DAY | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientAntivirusV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where PrimaryAntivirusProduct !contains "Defender"
| project Computer, CollectionTime, PrimaryAntivirusProduct, PrimaryAntivirusEXE, PrimaryAntivirusProductStateCode, PrimaryAntivirusProductStateTimestamp, PrimaryAntivirusRealTimeStatus, PrimaryAntivirusDefinitionStatus,Alternative1AntivirusProduct, Alternative1AntivirusEXE, Alternative1AntivirusProductStateCode, Alternative1AntivirusProductStateTimestamp
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"OTHER PRIMARY ANTIVIRUS (SECURITY CENTER) | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientDefenderAvV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where ( (AMRunningMode == "Not running") or 
          (parse_version(AMProductVersion) < parse_version("4.18.2203") ) or 
          (MPComputerStatusFound == false) or (MPPreferenceFound == false) or
          (RealTimeProtectionEnabled == false) or
          (AntivirusSignatureAge > 7) or (AntispywareSignatureAge > 7) or (NISSignatureAge > 7) or
          (AMRunningMode == "EDR Block Mode") or (AMRunningMode == "Passive Mode") or
          (AntispywareEnabled == false) or
         ( (TamperProtectionSource != "ATP") and (TamperProtectionSource != "Intune") ) or (IsTamperProtected == false)
        )
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, CollectionTime, MPComputerStatusFound, MPPreferenceFound, AMEngineVersion, AMProductVersion, AMRunningMode, AMServiceEnabled, AMServiceVersion, AntispywareEnabled, AntispywareSignatureAge, AntispywareSignatureLastUpdated, AntispywareSignatureVersion, AntivirusEnabled, AntivirusSignatureAge, AntivirusSignatureLastUpdated, AntivirusSignatureVersion, BehaviorMonitorEnabled, DefenderSignaturesOutOfDate, DisableAutoExclusions, DisableBehaviorMonitoring, DisableRealtimeMonitoring, DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan, DisableScanningNetworkFiles, DisableScriptScanning, EnableControlledFolderAccess, EnableNetworkProtection,    FullScanAge, IoavProtectionEnabled, IsTamperProtected, IsVirtualMachine, MAPSReporting, NISEnabled, NISEngineVersion, NISSignatureAge, NISSignatureLastUpdated, NISSignatureVersion, OnAccessProtectionEnabled, ProductStatus, PUAProtection, QuickScanAge, RealTimeProtectionEnabled, RealTimeScanDirection, RebootRequired, ScanAvgCPULoadFactor, SignatureUpdateCatchupInterval, SignatureUpdateInterval, SubmitSamplesConsent, TamperProtectionSource 
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT DEFENDER AV | CLIENTS | COUNT ","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsFirewallInfoV2_CL 
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Computer, Profile
| where Enabled != 1                   // 1=Enabled
| where DefaultInboundAction != 4      // 4=Block
| where DefaultOutboundAction != 2     // 2=Allow
| where AllowInboundRules != 1         // 1=True
| summarize total = count()
","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdatePendingUpdatesV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where LastDeploymentChangeTime < now(-40d)
| where Computer != ""
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, KBPublished = LastDeploymentChangeTime, Title=Title_, KB, CollectionTime
| sort by Computer asc
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"CLIENTS WITH PENDING UPDATES OLDER THAN 40 DAYS | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdatePendingUpdatesV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where LastDeploymentChangeTime < now(-40d)
| where DriverClass notcontains "Drivers"
| sort by Computer asc
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"CLIENTS WITH PENDING UPDATES OLDER THAN 40 DAYS, NO DRIVERS | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdateLastResultsV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where LastInstallationSuccessDate < ago(40d)
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, LastInstallationSuccessDate, LastSearchSuccessDate, CollectionTime
| sort by Computer asc
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"LAST WINDOWS UPDATE MORE THAN 40 DAYS AGO | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientOfficeInfoV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where ProductReleaseIds contains "O365"
| where UpdatesEnabled notcontains "True"
| project Computer, CollectionTime, UserLoggedOn, ProductReleaseIds, VersionToReport, OfficeMgmtCOM, Platform, ClientCulture, ClientFolder, CDNBaseUrl, OneDriveClientAddon, TeamsAddon, BingAddon, UpdatesEnabled, UpdateChannel
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"UPDATING O365 OFFICE NOT ENABLED | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientOfficeInfoV2_CL
| extend OfficeDescription_ = column_ifexists("OfficeDescription", "noata_found")
| extend OfficeVersionBuild_ = column_ifexists("OfficeVersionBuild", "noata_found")
| extend OfficeProductSKU_ = column_ifexists("OfficeProductSKU", "noata_found")
| extend OfficeInstallationPath_ = column_ifexists("OfficeInstallationPath", "noata_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannel_ = column_ifexists("OfficeUpdateChannel", "noata_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannelName_ = column_ifexists("OfficeUpdateChannelName", "noata_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateEnabled_ = column_ifexists("OfficeUpdateEnabled", "noata_found")
| extend VersionToReport_ = column_ifexists("VersionToReport", "noata_found")
| extend ProductReleaseIds_ = column_ifexists("ProductReleaseIds", "noata_found")
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where OfficeProductSKU_ contains "O365"
| where OfficeUpdateChannelName_ notcontains "Current Channel"
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, OfficeDescription=OfficeDescription_, OfficeVersionBuild=OfficeVersionBuild_ , OfficeProductSKU=OfficeProductSKU_, OfficeInstallationPath=OfficeInstallationPath_, OfficeUpdateChannel=OfficeUpdateChannel_, OfficeUpdateChannelName=OfficeUpdateChannelName_, OfficeUpdateEnabled=OfficeUpdateEnabled_
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT UPDATE CHANNEL O365 OFFICE | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.value:

| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer

| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, AMEngineVersion, AMProductVersion, AMRunningMode, AMServiceEnabled, AMServiceVersion, AntispywareEnabled, AntispywareSignatureAge, AntispywareSignatureLastUpdated, AntispywareSignatureVersion, AntivirusEnabled, AntivirusSignatureAge, AntivirusSignatureLastUpdated, AntivirusSignatureVersion, BehaviorMonitorEnabled, DefenderSignaturesOutOfDate, DisableAutoExclusions, DisableBehaviorMonitoring, DisableRealtimeMonitoring, DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan, DisableScanningNetworkFiles, DisableScriptScanning, EnableControlledFolderAccess, EnableNetworkProtection,    FullScanAge, IoavProtectionEnabled, IsTamperProtected, IsVirtualMachine, MAPSReporting, NISEnabled, NISEngineVersion, NISSignatureAge, NISSignatureLastUpdated, NISSignatureVersion, OnAccessProtectionEnabled, ProductStatus, PUAProtection, QuickScanAge, RealTimeProtectionEnabled, RealTimeScanDirection, RebootRequired, ScanAvgCPULoadFactor, SignatureUpdateCatchupInterval, SignatureUpdateInterval, SubmitSamplesConsent, TamperProtectionSource, MPComputerStatusFound, MPPreferenceFound, CollectionTime
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"ONACCESSPROTECTION DISABLED DEFENDER AV | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo9632-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo9632-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}

| where (AntispywareSignatureAge >= 7)
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, AMEngineVersion, AMProductVersion, AMRunningMode, AMServiceEnabled, AMServiceVersion, AntispywareEnabled, AntispywareSignatureAge, AntispywareSignatureLastUpdated, AntispywareSignatureVersion, AntivirusEnabled, AntivirusSignatureAge, AntivirusSignatureLastUpdated, AntivirusSignatureVersion, BehaviorMonitorEnabled, DefenderSignaturesOutOfDate, DisableAutoExclusions, DisableBehaviorMonitoring, DisableRealtimeMonitoring, DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan, DisableScanningNetworkFiles, DisableScriptScanning, EnableControlledFolderAccess, EnableNetworkProtection,    FullScanAge, IoavProtectionEnabled, IsTamperProtected, IsVirtualMachine, MAPSReporting, NISEnabled, NISEngineVersion, NISSignatureAge, NISSignatureLastUpdated, NISSignatureVersion, OnAccessProtectionEnabled, ProductStatus, PUAProtection, QuickScanAge, RealTimeProtectionEnabled, RealTimeScanDirection, RebootRequired, ScanAvgCPULoadFactor, SignatureUpdateCatchupInterval, SignatureUpdateInterval, SubmitSamplesConsent, TamperProtectionSource, MPComputerStatusFound, MPPreferenceFound, CollectionTime
